mapper.select: select a.*,project_store.project_name,contract_information.contract_name,contract_information.contrscy_money from (select * from modal where del_flag=0)as a LEFT JOIN project_store on a.project_id=project_store.id LEFT JOIN contract_information on a.contract_id=contract_information.id ORDER BY a.id desc
select * from modal where del_flag=0 and contract_id=#{contractId}
mapper.update:
update modal
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
